block.p: American League DETROIT TIGERS -- Purchased the contract of LHP Glenn Dishman from Toledo of the American Association. Designated OF Jimmy Hurst for assignment. MILWAUKEE BREWERS -- Placed RHP Ben McDonald on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled C Kelly Stinnett from Tucson of the PCL.

American League DETROIT TIGERS -- Purchased the contract of LHP Glenn Dishman from Toledo of the American Association. Designated OF Jimmy Hurst for assignment. MILWAUKEE BREWERS -- Placed RHP Ben McDonald on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled C Kelly Stinnett from Tucson of the PCL.

National League FLORIDA MARLINS -- Signed RHP Bryan Harvey to a minor-league contract and assigned him to Brevard County of the Florida State League. Sent OF Cliff Floyd to Charlotte of the International League on a rehabilitation assignment.
